content: first tracks pattern by gnomadic knits © 2021 gnomadicknits please do not email copy or reproduce this pattern for profit contact caitlinshaw artworks@gmail com 1 materials whether you are heading out to yarn big sky bulky by polka dot sheep hit the slopes or enjoy a quiet 100% merino wool 106 yards/97 walk in the freshly fallen snow meters first tracks will keep you warm needles us7 4 5mm 16 in/40 cm circular us9 5 5mm 16 in/40 cm circular while you brave the cold to find and dpn your own fresh tracks knit in an dpn or cable needle notions stitch markers asymmetrical pattern using pom-pom mock-cables and a cable pattern tapestry needle to weave in ends topped with a pom-pom use gauge faux-fur or make your own 16 sts x 22 row = 4 inches in mock cable pattern cables are knit over 3 sts with 5 sts between size & measurements currently one size only average adult head stitch guide bc back cross = slip 1 purl stitch to cable needle and hold in back knit 2 then purl the stitch from cable needle bdkc back double knit cross = slip 2 knit stitches to cable needle and hold in back knit 2 then knit 2 from cable needle co = cast on fc front cross = slip 2 knit stitches to cable needle and hold in front purl 1 then knit 2 from cable needle fdkc front double knit cross = slip 2 knit stitches to cable needle and hold in front knit 2 then knit 2 from cable needle k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together mmc make mock cable = skip 2 stitches and insert needle into 3rd stitch on left needle and knit lifting the stitch over the two skipped stitches as you go knit 2 stitches p = purl pm = place marker © 2021 gnomadicknits please do not email copy or reproduce this pattern for profit contact caitlinshaw artworks@gmail com 2 pattern co 81 sts using us7 needle place first marker to indicate beginning of row and join careful not to twist perform p1 k2 rib for 8 rounds **switch to larger us9 needles** set up row k2tog k1 p3 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 pm *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * to end of round 80 sts skip to round 2 round 1 k2 p3 k2 p2 k2 p3 k2 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * to end of round round 2 knit the knits purl the purls round 3 fc p2 fc bc p2 bc *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 4 knit knits purl purls to stitch marker *p2 mmc p3 repeat from * round 5 p1 fc p2 fdkc p2 bc p1 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 6 knit the knits purl the purls round 7 p2 fc bc twice p2 *p2 k3 p3 repeat from * round 8 knit knits purl purls to stitch marker *p2 mmc p3 repeat from *
